misc: Famous for being an ambassador for the AimPoint method for putting.
biography: Timo, a familiar face at the Hector Trophée, hails from Keimola Golf and is celebrated for his dedication to the sport and, notably, as an ambassador for the AimPoint method of putting. His calm demeanor on the course belies a fierce competitive spirit.

With eight past appearances at the Hector Trophée, Timo has become a mainstay in the tournament. Each year, his strategic play and meticulous attention to detail make him a formidable opponent. His insights into course management are often sought by fellow competitors, reflecting his respected position within the golfing community.

Timo has secured the coveted Hector Trophée three times, showcasing not only his skill but also his ability to perform under pressure. Though the Victor Trophy has eluded him, his focus remains steadfast on team success. As he prepares for his ninth appearance at the Hector Trophée in 2025, anticipation builds around his potential to further solidify his legacy in the tournament.
